body.p:
New Castle: Jany 5. 1863
To His Excelency:
The Governor

Some two weeks ago. I forwarded to yr. department a petition signed by many citizens for the remission of fine of $50 ag M B Ireland & W Brown Will you be pleased Governor to remit the fine -- I assure you that the facts are true as set out in petition -- My wife & children join in the request
